titleStmt.title: A remonstrance of the popish clergy of France, to their present King Lewis XIV. Wherein is attempted an utter suppression & subversion of the Protestant religion in that King's dominions and conquests. Translated into English by a person of quality, for the public benefit.
Remonstrance du clergé de France faite au Roy a Versailles le 14 septembre, 1675. English.
titleStmt.author: Catholic Church. Assemblée générale du clergé de France.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Brome at the Gun in St. Paul's Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Remonstrance du clergé de France faite au Roy a Versailles le 14 septembre, 1675.

Includes translation of the original colophon: Printed at Paris: By Frederick Leonard, printer to the King and the clergy of France, in James Street at the Crown of Venice. MDCLXXV. With the King's priviledge.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Gun in St. Paul's Church-yard.
